actions.name: AddNotificationChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to add up to 2 topic ARNs of existing AWS SNS topics to publish notifications

actions.name: BatchGetFrameMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the frame metric data for a Profiling Group

actions.name: ConfigureAgent
actions.description: Grants permission for an agent to register with the orchestration service and retrieve profiling configuration information

actions.name: CreateProfilingGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a profiling group

actions.name: DeleteProfilingGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a profiling group

actions.name: DescribeProfilingGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a profiling group

actions.name: GetFindingsReportAccountSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to get a summary of recent recommendations for each profiling group in the account

actions.name: GetNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get the notification configuration

actions.name: GetPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to get the resource policy associated with the specified Profiling Group

actions.name: GetProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to get aggregated profiles for a specific profiling group

actions.name: GetRecommendations
actions.description: Grants permission to get recommendations

actions.name: ListFindingsReports
actions.description: Grants permission to list the available recommendations reports for a specific profiling group

actions.name: ListProfileTimes
actions.description: Grants permission to list the start times of the available aggregated profiles for a specific profiling group

actions.name: ListProfilingGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list profiling groups in the account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a Profiling Group

actions.name: PostAgentProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to submit a profile collected by an agent belonging to a specific profiling group for aggregation

actions.name: PutPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to update the list of principals allowed for an action group in the resource policy associated with the specified Profiling Group

actions.name: RemoveNotificationChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an already configured SNStopic arn from the notification configuration

actions.name: RemovePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the permission of specified Action Group from the resource policy associated with the specified Profiling Group

actions.name: SubmitFeedback
actions.description: Grants permission to submit user feedback for useful or non useful anomaly

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite tags to a Profiling Group

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Profiling Group

actions.name: UpdateProfilingGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific profiling group
